abstract: Chloride Group, the British power supply company, said Friday that it has accepted an improved takeover bid from U.S. competitor Emerson Electric that values it at 997 million pounds ($1.5 billion).
snippet: Chloride Group, the British power supply company, said Friday that it has accepted an improved takeover bid from U.S. competitor Emerson Electric that values it at 997 million pounds ($1.5 billion).
lead_paragraph: Chloride Group, the British power supply company, said Friday that it has accepted an improved takeover bid from the American  competitor, Emerson Electric,  that values it at £997 million ($1.5 billion).

headline.main: Britain’s Chloride Seals Deal With Emerson
